TYPE: type of the case of the master/parent record
RECORD NO LOSS POTENTIAL: The record number of the loss potential.
IMPACT_TYPE: type of impact specified in the loss potential
SEVERITY_DESCRIPTION: description of severity selected in Risk Matrix
LIKELIHOOD_TYPE: description of the type of likelihood selected in the Risk Matrix
LIKELIHOOD_DESCRIPTION: description of likelihood selected in Risk Matrix as specified in record
RISK_COLOR: Color of the risk of the incident
MITIGATED_RISK_COLOR: The final color of the incident after mitigation
DATE_OF_INCIDENT: date in which the incident ocurred
DATE_TIME_OF_INCIDENT: date and time in which the incident ocurred
TITLE: title of the record
WORKPLACE: workplace/location specified in the record; a combination/concatenation of site location, city, country, and region
PROJECT: project as specified in the record
DESCRIPTION: Unstructured textual description of the incident
CASE_CATEGORIZATION: categorization of the incident as specified in the record
WORK_PROCESS: work process as specified in the record
LIFE_SAVING_RULES: life-saving rules specified in the record
LOSS_POTENTIAL_SEVERITY: Severity of the potential loss of the incident. 1 means lowest severity and 5 means highest severity.
OPERATING_CENTER: operating system corresponding to the selected project
LOCATION_CODE: location code assigned to the workplace specified in the reocrd
